## ColdWallet.getBalance() method

Retrieves the total available balance of the wallet, encoded in CBOR.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBalance(): Promise<Value>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Value&gt;

{<!-- -->Promise<Value>} - The balance of the wallet.
